attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Beggars belief that nothing has been learnt since the climbie report..After that we were all told it would never be allowed to happen again ? Sadly it has another young life life lost to the incompatence of the useless child protection team .. The goverment needs to now show and make a stand that child abuse will not be tolerated and therefore all the staff from social workers involved in the Baby P case including child protection Directors to be dismissed asap to restore confidence in the British Public

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
